results.title: Love serenade
results.creator_credit: Shirley Barrett, Jan Chapman, AFFC and Saddleback Productions
results.brief_description: Two bored sisters Dimity and Vicki-Ann live in a small country town. Their new neighbour, a brooding self-centered radio personality arrives on the scene and threatens to turn their world upside down. Dimity and Vicki-Ann find themselves in competition for his affections as each develops a severe crush on the aging Lothario with a predilection for ‘70’s music and young women. Awarded the Camera D’Or at the 1996 Cannes Film Festival and starring Miranda Otto and Rebecca Frith (as the love-torn sisters) alongside George Shevtsov and John Alansu. Cinematography by Mandy Walker.

results.title: Mighty Ducks 2
results.creator_credit: Sam Weisman, Jon Avnet, Jordan Kerner and Walt Disney Pictures
results.brief_description: Emilio Estevez returns in another heartwarming comedy about the Mighty Ducks; an ice-hockey team full of misfit teenagers with the desire to be the best they can be. The team win an opportunity to represent their country in the Junior Goodwill Games to be held in Los Angeles. Two challenges await them - the fierce competition in the form of the team from Iceland and resisting the Hollywood glitz and glamour which threatens to tear them apart. Only team spirit will help them overcome these obstacles.

results.title: Rob Roy
results.creator_credit: Michael Caton-Jones, Richard Jackson, Peter Broughan and Talisman
results.brief_description: When a harsh winter threatens the majestic Scottish Highlands, Robert Roy McGregor (Liam Neeson) is forced to borrow money from the not so noble Marquis of Montrose (John Hurt) to provide for his clan. But when Montrose’s evil henchmen (brilliantly portrayed by Tim Roth and Brian Cox) conspire to take the wealth for themselves, they thrust Rob into the most challenging battle of his life, one that escalates into a bloody and gripping climax. Breathtaking landscapes, steamy romance and non-stop action combine to make this a thrilling and powerful adventure.

results.title: The Blue kite
results.brief_description: The fate of a Beijing family under Mao Tse Tung’s regime from the early 1950’s to the Cultural Revolution is the focus of this film by talented filmaker Tian Zhuangzhuang. Seen from the perspective of Tietou who grows from child to adolescence as he observes his mother’s three marriages. Although epic in proportion, the intimacy of domestic life is a poignant contrast to the political dramas occuring. The film was banned in China but a print was smuggled out of the country allowing the rest of the world an opportunity to experience this inspirational human drama.

results.title: Street fighter II: the animated movie
results.creator_credit: Gisaburo Sugii, Kenichi Imai and Capcom Productions
results.brief_description: Based on the popular video game of the same name. Human civilisation is under attack in the not so distant future. Bison is the evil mastermind who leads the forces of evil and wants to take possession of the world’s best fighters so he can use them to conquer the world. Ken and Ryu are the only two humans in the world with the skill and strength to stop them. What ensues is a mighty battle in the classic clash between the forces of good and evil.

results.title: Sense and sensibility
results.creator_credit: Ang Lee, Lindsay Doran, Columbia Pictures and Mirage Enterprises
results.brief_description: Ang Lee directs this well scripted, acted and beautifully photographed version of Jane Austen’s first novel. Emma Thompson, (who wrote the screenplay), and Kate Winslet are Elinor and Marianne. Elinor uses her head and Marianne is guided by her heart. Both sisters eventually find love but only after the usual complications. A star-studded cast including Hugh Grant and Alan Rickman.

results.title: The Bridges of Madison County
results.creator_credit: Clint Eastwood, Kathleen Kennedy, Malpaso Company and Amblin Entertainment
results.brief_description: Robert Kincaid (Clint Eastwood) is a photographer for National Geographic on assignment shooting the old bridges of Madison County. He meets Francesca Johnson (Meryl Streep), a farm wife whose husband and children have gone away for a week and the two fall in love. Both realise that their love is special but that their lives can only touch for a few short days. Based on the best selling heart warming novel by Robert James Waller.

results.title: Ninja scroll (D)
results.creator_credit: Yoshiaki Kawajiri, Masaki Sawanobori, Haruo Sai, Shigeaki Komatsu, Movic, Toho Kabushiki Kaisha and JVC
results.brief_description: Feudal Japan - a time of danger, intrigue and deception. Jubei is a masterless ninja who travels the land alone, hiring his services to those with gold or a worthy cause. An evil conspiracy is at work to overthrow the Government. Jubei reluctantly joins forces with a mysterious old man and the beautiful but tragic Kagero, in an effort to defeat the Shogun of the dark and his demonic cronies. Not surprisingly this is a struggle that involves huge amounts of action, violence, bloodletting, sex, supernatural powers and transmogrification. The animation is an impressive though slightly incongruous blend of detailed architecture, evocative landscape and highly stylized action figures. It will also interest followers of popular culture. Citizens Award Winner, 1993 Yubari City International Adventure Fantastic Film Festival. PLEASE NOTE THAT THIS ANIMATED FILM HAS AN ‘R’ RATING FOR PERSONS OVER THE AGE OF 18 DUE TO THE EXPLICIT VIOLENT AND SEXUAL NATURE OF ITS CONTENT.

results.title: Duel in the sun
results.creator_credit: King Vidor, David O. Selznick and David O Selznick Productions
results.brief_description: Scott Chavez, hung for the murder of his wife and her lover, sends his daughter to live with land baron Senator McCanles. The senator’s sons are immediately drawn to Pearl and fall under her spell. Brother is pitted against brother in this classic western filled with love, betrayal and murder. Starring Gregory Peck and Jennifer Jones as the ill-fated lovers and an admirable cast including Joseph Cotten, Lionel Barrymore, Herbert Marshall, Lillian Gish, Walter Huston and Charles Bickford.

results.title: Reap the wild wind
results.creator_credit: Cecil B. DeMille and Paramount Pictures
results.brief_description: Shipwreck on the Reef, Shipwreck on the Reef, this was the cry the local shipowners and salvage operators in Key West during the 1840’s awaited. Their business thrived on the cargo of wrecked ships but are all the wrecks caused by nature or man made? Why is it that King Cutler (Raymond Massey) always seemed to be the first on the scene? These and other questions are asked by local ship owner Loxi Claiborne (Paulette Goddard) and others. Meanwhile Loxi’s suitor Captain Jack Stuart (John Wayne) is suspected by the jealous lawyer Steve Tolliver (Ray Milland). Who will win in the romance stakes? The star studded cast includes Robert Preston, Susan Heywood, Charles Bickford, Walter Hampden and Janet Beecher. This Cecil B. DeMille production of piracy, hot-blooded love and huge clipper ships gliding in the mist won an Academy Award for its Special Effects and was based on a Saturday Evening Post story by Thelma Strabel.
